text: logo! agar tumhe marne ke baadh ji uthne mein shak hai, to soncho hum ne tumhe mitthi se paida kiya, phir nutfe se, phir qoon basta se, phir gosh ke luthde se jo surath diya gaya tha aur be naqsha tha, ye hum tum par zaaher kar dete hai, aur hum jise chaahe ek tehraaye hoye waqt tak rehem maadar mein rakhte hai, phir tumhe bachpan ki haalath mein dunya mein laate hai, phir ta ke tum apni puri jawaani ko pahoncho, tum mein se baaz to wo hai jo fauth kar liye jaate hai aur baaz be-gharz umr ki taraf phir se lauta diye jaate hai, ke wo ek cheez se ba-qabar hone ke baadh, phir be qabar ho jaaye, tu dekhta hai ke zameen (banjar aur) khushk hai, phir jab hum us par baarishe barsaate hai, to wo ubharti hai aur phoolti hai aur har qism ki raunaq daar nabataat ugaati hai
